Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the picture by stating that "True Indian can never ignore this pic" and that "This is our army... They will do anything for us."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to prove its validity. It only provides a picture and an emotional statement without any additional context or information.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the picture is of an Indian soldier and a woman during rescue operations in Kerala. However, there are enough clues in the photograph that indicate it is not related to the mentioned context.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the picture is not of rescue operations in Kerala, but rather of a member of the Iraqi PMU helping a civilian after the city of Fallujah was freed from ISIS in June 2016.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim presents an alternative explanation for the picture by suggesting that it is not of an Indian soldier, but rather a member of the Iraqi PMU.
